content: Detox Shibir — Rejuvenate Your Body, Mind & Vitality

Detox Shibir — Your First Step to Lasting Health Transformation: Modern lifestyle, stress, and improper food habits often lead to an accumulation of toxins in the body, disturbing our natural balance. Our Detox Shibir is a unique opportunity to reset, cleanse, and revive your health from within.
Why Detox is Essential:

Over time, toxins contribute to conditions like Diabetes, Obesity, High Blood Pressure, Fatty Liver, and High Cholesterol. True healing begins when the body is given a chance to rest, detoxify, and rejuvenate through time-tested natural methods.
What You Will Experience:

✔ Understanding the Science of Detoxification — Practical, simplified knowledge for daily life.
✔ Supervised Prolonged Fasting — Tailored fasting protocols from 2 to 5 days, depending on individual health status.
✔ Powerful Detox Therapies:
• Steam Bath | Heating Pad Therapy | Tool-based Massages | Mud Face Pack | Dhanwantari Yog
✔ In-depth Insights — Understand the root causes and reversal strategies for lifestyle disorders like Diabetes, Obesity, Blood Pressure, Fatty Liver, and Cholesterol Imbalance.
Who Can Attend:
This transformational course is exclusively for those who have already adopted our personalized Food Plan. This ensures your body is prepared and safe for deep detox practices.
For any doubts or queries, please post them in your dedicated support group.
Detox Shibir — Your First Step to Lasting Health Transformation
Join us to unlock your natural healing potential, experience lightness, mental clarity, and a renewed sense of vitality.
Limited seats — For committed individuals ready for deep transformation.
